blocks.name: mgpsumunsn
blocks.content: Extract a summand/factor from the group sum for the multiplicative group of a unital ring. (Contributed by AV, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpsumunsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s0, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c2), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, c2, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), w0)
  eqcomd(c1, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  difsnid(c3, c1)
  gsumunsn(s0, c0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c3, c2, c4, c5, cfv(cbs, c6), c1, w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c6), c0, c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  mgpplusg(c4, c0, c6)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c6, ccrg))
  crngmgp(c6, c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  diffi(c1, csn(c3))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c1, csn(c3))
  neldifsnd(c3, c1, w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, csn(c3))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c6)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpsumunsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5))
  ⊣ c0 =(mulGrp ` c6)
  ⊣ c4 =(× ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(Base ` c6))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈(Base ` c6))
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c2 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })↦ c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s0 ∈((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })↦ c2), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, c1, c2, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), w0)
  eqcomd(c1, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), w0)
  syl(w0, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })= c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  difsnid(c3, c1)
  gsumunsn(s0, c0, (c1 \ { c3 }), c3, c2, c4, c5, (Base ` c6), c1, w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c6), c0, c6)
  eqid((Base ` c6))
  mgpplusg(c4, c0, c6)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c6 ∈ CRing)
  crngmgp(c6, c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 \ { c3 })∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  diffi(c1, { c3 })
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 }), c2 ∈(Base ` c6), s0 ∈ c1)
  eldifi(s0, c1, { c3 })
  neldifsnd(c3, c1, w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, (c1 \ { c3 }), { c3 })
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, { c3 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c6)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mgpsumz
blocks.content: If the group sum for the multiplicative group of a unital ring contains a summand/factor that is the zero of the ring, the group sum itself is zero. (Contributed by AV, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpsumz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmgp, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmulr, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c6), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c3, co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), c2)), c5, c3), w0)
  mgpsumunsn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c6, c5, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c4, cmnd))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cmnd), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  syl(wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c4, cmnd), wcel(c4, crg))
  ringmnd(c4)
  mndidcl(c4, c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), c2)), c5, c3), c3), wcel(c4, crg), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), c2)), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, crg), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  crngring(c4)
  gsummptcl(s0, c0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), c2, cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c4), c0, c4)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  crngmgp(c4, c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c1, csn(c6)), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  diffi(c1, csn(c6))
  ralrimiva(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c6))), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c1, csn(c6))
  ringrz(c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c6)), c2)), cfv(cbs, c4), c5, c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, csn(c6))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c6)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpsumz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(mulGrp ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(× ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(Base ` c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c6 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), c3, ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c6 })↦ c2))[c5]c3), w0)
  mgpsumunsn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c6, c5, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈(Base ` c4), c4 ∈ Mnd)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Mnd, c4 ∈ CRing)
  syl(c4 ∈ CRing, c4 ∈ Mnd, c4 ∈ Ring)
  ringmnd(c4)
  mndidcl(c4, c3, (Base ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c6 })↦ c2))[c5]c3)= c3, c4 ∈ Ring, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c6 })↦ c2))∈(Base ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Ring, c4 ∈ CRing)
  crngring(c4)
  gsummptcl(s0, c0, (c1 \ { c6 }), c2, (Base ` c4), w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c4), c0, c4)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c4 ∈ CRing)
  crngmgp(c4, c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 \ { c6 })∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  diffi(c1, { c6 })
  ralrimiva(s0, (c1 \ { c6 }), w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c4))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \ { c6 }), c2 ∈(Base ` c4), s0 ∈ c1)
  eldifi(s0, c1, { c6 })
  ringrz(c4, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c6 })↦ c2)), (Base ` c4), c5, c3)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, { c6 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c6)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mgpsumn
blocks.content: If the group sum for the multiplicative group of a unital ring contains a summand/factor that is the one of the ring, this summand/ factor can be removed from the group sum. (Contributed by AV, 29-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm mgpsumn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmgp, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmulr, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cur, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c2, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c5, c6), w0)
  mgpsumunsn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c4, crg))
  ringidcl(c4, c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c5, c6), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2))), wcel(c4, crg), wcel(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, crg), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  crngring(c4)
  gsummptcl(s0, c0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2, cfv(cbs, c4), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c4), c0, c4)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c4, ccrg))
  crngmgp(c4, c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn))
  diffi(c1, csn(c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c1, csn(c3))
  ringridm(c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), cfv(cbs, c4), c5, c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, csn(c3))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mgpsumn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=(c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2)))
  ⊣ c0 =(mulGrp ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(× ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ CRing)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(Base ` c4))
  ⊣ c6 =(1r ` c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c2 = c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c5]c6), w0)
  mgpsumunsn(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c6 ∈(Base ` c4), c4 ∈ Ring)
  ringidcl(c4, c6, (Base ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c5]c6)=(c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2)), c4 ∈ Ring, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))∈(Base ` c4))
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Ring, c4 ∈ CRing)
  crngring(c4)
  gsummptcl(s0, c0, (c1 \ { c3 }), c2, (Base ` c4), w0)
  mgpbas((Base ` c4), c0, c4)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ CMnd, c4 ∈ CRing)
  crngmgp(c4, c0)
  syl(w0, (c1 \ { c3 })∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin)
  diffi(c1, { c3 })
  ralrimiva(s0, (c1 \ { c3 }), w0, c2 ∈(Base ` c4))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 }), c2 ∈(Base ` c4), s0 ∈ c1)
  eldifi(s0, c1, { c3 })
  ringridm(c4, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2)), (Base ` c4), c5, c6)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, { c3 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: gsumsplit2f
blocks.content: Split a group sum into two parts. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumsplit2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2)))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfsupp, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c3, c5), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cun(c3, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5))), w0)
  gsumsplit(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, c8, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c1, c6, c2, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c3, c2)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c5, c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3), cmpt(s0, c3, c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c1, cun(c3, c5), w0)
  ssun1(c3, c5)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c5), cmpt(s0, c5, c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c5, c1, cun(c3, c5), w0)
  ssun2(c5, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumsplit2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[finSupp]c7)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 ⋂ c5)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(c3 ⋃ c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2))), ((c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3))[c4](c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5))), w0)
  gsumsplit(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c1, c8, w0)
  fmptdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c1, c6, c2, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  oveq12d((c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3)), c4, (c0[gsum]((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2)), (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c3), (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c1, (c3 ⋃ c5), w0)
  ssun1(c3, c5)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|` c5), (s0 ∈ c5 ↦ c2), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c5, c1, (c3 ⋃ c5), w0)
  ssun2(c5, c3)
}

blocks.name: gsumdifsndf
blocks.content: Extract a summand from a finitely supported group sum. (Contributed by AV, 4-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumdifsndf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c5)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, c5), co(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c3), c2))), w0)
  gsumsplit2f(s0, c0, c1, c2, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c4, csn(c3), c6, cfv(c0g, c0), c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl5reqr(cin(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), emptycls, cdif(csn(c3), csn(c3)), w0)
  difid(csn(c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(cdif(csn(c3), csn(c3)), cin(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3))), wss(csn(c3), c1))
  snssd(c3, c1, w0)
  difin2(csn(c3), c1, csn(c3))
  eqcomd(c1, cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cun(cdif(c1, csn(c3)), csn(c3)), c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  difsnid(c3, c1)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cdif(c1, csn(c3)), c2)), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, csn(c3), c2)), c5, w0)
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c3, c2, c5, c6, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  cmnmnd(c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, csn(c3))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumdifsndf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c5)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c6 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMnd)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[finSupp](0 ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c3)→ c2 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))=((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5)), d(s0, c0))
  eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4]c5), ((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2))[c4](c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c3 } ↦ c2))), w0)
  gsumsplit2f(s0, c0, c1, c2, (c1 \ { c3 }), c4, { c3 }, c6, (0 ` c0), c7, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  syl5reqr(((c1 \ { c3 })⋂ { c3 }), emptycls, ({ c3 } \ { c3 }), w0)
  difid({ c3 })
  syl(w0, ({ c3 } \ { c3 })=((c1 \ { c3 })⋂ { c3 }), { c3 } ⊆ c1)
  snssd(c3, c1, w0)
  difin2({ c3 }, c1, { c3 })
  eqcomd(c1, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 }), w0)
  syl(w0, ((c1 \ { c3 })⋃ { c3 })= c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  difsnid(c3, c1)
  oveq2d((c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1 \ { c3 })↦ c2)), c4, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ { c3 } ↦ c2)), c5, w0)
  gsumsnfd(s0, c0, c3, c2, c5, c6, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ CMnd)
  cmnmnd(c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, { c3 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}
